Package de.javasoft.swing.jytable.renderer

Interface Summary
ITableHeaderCell Properties to define the layout and content of a header cell with sort marker.
 

Class Summary
CellLayoutHint LayoutHint for JYTableHeader cells.
CellLayoutHint.CellLayoutHintUIResource Layout hint which implements UIResource for use by LAFs
DefaultTableHeaderRenderer Adapter to glue SwingX renderer support to core api.
DefaultTableHeaderRenderer.DefaultTableHeaderRendererUI  
JYTableHeaderCell An implementation of ITableHeaderCell used in JYTableHeader.
TableHeaderCellContext TableHeader specific cell context.
TableHeaderCellProvider An implementation of ComponentProvider which provides a configured JYTableHeaderCell as rendering component.
 

Enum Summary
ITableHeaderCell.HorizontalDock Defines horizontal alignment of sort marker for vertical stacking of client area/sort marker.
ITableHeaderCell.HorizontalStretch Defines distribution of horizont excess space relative to client area for horizontal stacking of client area/sort marker.
ITableHeaderCell.SortMarkerPosition  
TableRegion TableRegion is a marker for different roles in a table compound, that is JYTable, its header and subheaders.
